section_a_workflow_definition.q01_workflow_name: Order Fulfillment for Home Goods Sold through Shopify
section_a_workflow_definition.q02_trigger_event: Customer completes checkout on their website
section_a_workflow_definition.q03_business_objective: Ship orders within 24 hours for in-stock items
section_a_workflow_definition.q04_end_condition: Warehouse staff manually updates order status in Shopify

section_c_systems_handoffs.q11_manual_data_transfers: Warehouse staff manually prints packing slip from email, checks inventory in separate spreadsheet, and updates order status in Shopify
section_c_systems_handoffs.q12_human_decision_gates: Staff manually packs and labels items using USPS Click-N-Ship website

section_d_failure_cost.q13_common_failures: Inventory spreadsheet is frequently out of sync with actual stock, staff can't find items in warehouse, peak season creates massive backlog, tracking numbers are manually entered wrong
section_d_failure_cost.q14_cost_if_slow_or_failed: $15 in customer service time and rush shipping to make up for delays, refunds and customer complaints due to overselling, lost sales due to 'out of stock' when items are actually available

section_e_priority.q15_one_thing_to_fix: Sync Shopify with our inventory in real-time so we stop overselling and can auto-generate shipping labels

attachments.notes: About 25% of orders miss the 24-hour shipping SLA, customer service gets 50+ 'where's my order' calls per day, customer acquisition cost is $45, and delayed shipping causes 12% of first-time buyers not to return.
